scripts.prod: npx concurrently -n COMPILE,SERVER -c cyan,green "yarn watch:compile" "yarn watch:serve"
scripts.build: yarn compile && yarn dist:clean && yarn dist:copy
scripts.clean: rm -rf lib && (cd ../../common && rm -rf lib) && (cd ../shared && rm -rf lib) && (cd ../email && rm -rf lib)
scripts.compile: tsc -b && tsc-alias && (cd ../../common && tsc-alias) && (cd ../shared && tsc-alias) && (cd ../email && tsc-alias) && cp -r src/public/ lib/
scripts.debug: nodemon -r tsconfig-paths/register --watch src -e ts --watch ../../common/src --watch ../shared/src --exec "yarn build && node --inspect-brk src/serve.ts"
scripts.dist:clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/common/lib dist/backend/shared/lib dist/backend/api/lib dist/backend/email/lib
scripts.dist:copy: rsync -a --delete ../../common/lib/ dist/common/lib && rsync -a --delete ../shared/lib/ dist/backend/shared/lib && rsync -a --delete ../email/lib/ dist/backend/email/lib && rsync -a --delete ./lib/* dist/backend/api/lib && cp ../../yarn.lock dist && cp package.json dist && cp package.json dist/backend/api
